title: Securing a Laravel API in 20 minutes with JWTs
description: In this video you'll learn how you can secure a Laravel API and authenticate users within it using JSON Web Tokens.

title: How to develop a simple Laravel package locally
description: In this 15 minute video, I'll show you how I developed a simple Laravel wrapper package that makes calls to an external API.

title: Create a local Laravel dev environment with Docker
description: You'll learn how to create a docker-compose file and define services needed for Laravel and build a service from a local Dockerfile.

title: How to use Laravel's bind and singleton methods
description: In this short video, I'll show you how to use Laravel's bind + singleton service provider methods in your application, as well as demo example use cases for both.

title: Viewing a Docker MySQL database with PHPMyAdmin and Sequel Pro
description: In this short video, I'll show you how to view a MySQL database created with Docker in both PHPMyAdmin and Sequel Pro.

title: Adding social logins with Laravel Socialite
description: In this 10 minute video, I'll show you how to get started with Laravel Socialite by adding a fully-functional "Sign In with GitHub" button to an existing application.

title: A much better local Laravel dev environment with Docker
description: This is a follow-up to my original local Laravel dev environment with Docker video (watch that first). For those who want a more complete containerized solution, without having to have Composer, Node, or PHP installed locally!

title: Getting started with Amazon S3 storage in Laravel
description: In this 15 minute video, I'll show you how to set up an Amazon S3 bucket to store images and files with your Laravel app using a few built-in methods.

title: Adding geolocation and Google Maps to Vue applications
description: In this video, I'll show you how to use two simple packages to introduce geolocation and embedded Google Maps to your new or existing Vue apps.

title: Running multiple Laravel apps locally with Docker
description: In this 13 minute video, I'll show you how to run two separate Laravel applications using local Docker networks and communicate between them.

title: Authentication in Vue using Laravel Sanctum
description: In this 23 minute video I'll show you how to set up a Laravel app and Vue component, and make authenticated calls using Laravel's Sanctum package.

title: Easily deploy a Laravel application with Docker
description: In this 21 minute video, I'll show you how to easily deploy a Laravel application using Docker and two separate methods to get source files on a server.

title: 5 tips for supercharged Laravel Eloquent queries
description: In this 16 minute video, I'll show you 5 simple tips and tricks that you can use to enhance your Laravel Eloquent queries, saving time and helping to clean up your code.

title: Populating a Google Map with Vue and Laravel
description: In this 25 minute video, I'll show you how to create and embed a Google Map with Vue, then populate that same map with pins and pop-up info windows using data pulled in from a Laravel API.

title: Let's build with Laravel: A Linktree clone
description: In my longest video yet at just under 1 hour, I'll show you how to create a basic Linktree (https://linktr.ee) clone from scratch in Laravel.

title: Running scheduled Laravel tasks with Docker
description: In this 17 minute video, I'll show you how to schedule and run Laravel Artisan commands inside of a Docker environment. These techniques can be used for local development or production environments.

title: Organizing data with Laravel collections
description: In this 32 minute video, I'll show you 12 examples using Laravel Collections that you can use to organize, sort, and filter your large or complex data sets.

title: Build a Vue shopping cart with Laravel Cashier and Stripe
description: In this 55 minute video, I'll show you how to create a basic e-commerce site powered by a Vue SPA and Laravel API, which takes payments through Stripe thanks to the Laravel Cashier package.

title: Getting started with Laravel Breeze and Jetstream
description: In this 28 minute video, I'll show you how to install and use the Breeze and Jetstream authentication starter kits in a new Laravel application.

title: Build a solid WordPress dev environment with Docker
description: In this 25 minute video, I'll show you how to create and use a basic WordPress development environment built with Docker and Docker Compose.

title: Getting started with Laravel Passport and OAuth2
description: In this 29 minute video, I'll show you how to install and use the powerful Passport authentication package in an example Laravel application.
